itunes:title: Episode 546 - Crazy First Responder Stories!
title: Episode 546 - Crazy First Responder Stories!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by former cop Eric Tansey as they take calls from the Drinkin' Bros First Responders group as they share wild stories about lesbians getting arrested for using strap-ons in public, a 400 pound man being used as ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by former cop Eric Tansey as they take calls from the Drinkin' Bros First Responders group as they share wild stories about lesbians getting arrested for using strap-ons in public, a 400 pound man being used as a "Poo Pinata", and a crazy Korean woman who held a woman hostage.
